description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync X464UNV - 46" LED-Backlit LCD Flat Panel Display
NEC's 46" X464UNV sets the standard for rugged 24/7 use in the harshest installation environments. LED edge lighting delivers environmental, economic, and aesthetic impact. With a decreased total cost of ownership, an upgraded cabinet, and customizable connectivity options, the X464UNV delivers stunning solutions, every time. This display received a full chassis upgrade with the addition of a second expansion slot, faster processing times, evolved daisy chain performance, and near field communication capabilities.
dimensions wxdxh: 102.4 cm x 11.73 cm x 57.86 cm - without stand
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), TileMatrix (10 x 10), Eco Mode, temperature sensor, Open Pluggable Specification slot, Carbon Footprint Meter, built-in NFC sensor, automatic alarm e-mails, Frame Comp, HTTP server, Point Zoom function
